DOC.HEADLINE: ' 94 WINTER_OLYMPICS / LILLEHAMMER ; NOTEBOOK
DOC.TEXT: Finland shut_out Russia for the second time , 4-0 , Saturday night to win the bronze medal.Their only other Olympic hockey medal was a silver in 1988 . For the first time , the Russians came_away empty handed . In their 10 previous Olympics as the Soviet_Union and Unified Team , they won eight gold medals , one silver and one bronze . They were never shut_out and had a 60-6-2 record . This year ' s team finished at 4-4 , including a 5-0 shutout by Finland in the second preliminary-round game .
